Description: RARE+++ High Grade Ω Omega Gents Swiss Oversized Mechanical wristwatch, 15 Jew. *SERVICED* This auction represents unique example of an antique men's timepiece of one of the most known and recognized Swiss brands. It was made by “Omega Factory”! The watches under the trade mark 'OMEGA’ always differed by style, accuracy and fidelity to the best traditions of watch affair. So this OMEGA watch is most definitely one of the more interesting watches that you can buy! A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the the original high grade, gold-filled pocket watch movement '' OMEGA '' with 15 Ruby Jewels. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! Smooth and strong running of the balance. The branded original movement on the back side is stamped a serial number #8199623. Signed : '' OMEGA SWISS 15 JEWELS #8199623 ''. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! See the photos for more details!!! This astonishing timepiece has a four-piece, double hinged case that testifies about a quality of watch. The inner dust cover lid was used to protect the mechanism from dust and debris and to provide an extra layer of protection from shock or moisture. The case is made of chrome/nickel. Professionally polished, it's literally like a mirror. No signs of any serious damages. The inside of back lid has the trademark Omega Watch Co. triangle with the inscription ‘ OMEGA - SWISS MADE - FABRICATION SUISSE '' about it and case reference number #9055379. The watch supplied with a brand new genuine leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. For more photos to the case see photos below the whole description!!! Diameter watch without the crown: 48 mm.Diameter watch with the crown and both lugs: 59 mmThickness watch: 13 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! This amazing timepiece has gorgeous white, porcelain, enamel dial. Absolutely original! In excellent cosmetic condition, no signs of any scratches, cracks or hairlines. The dial has black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. Signed : '' OMEGA / FAB. SUISSE ''. Also the watch comes with original, beautiful hands! The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new, because old one was in very worse condition! See the photos for more details!!! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED! Please serious bidders only, bidders with 0 feedback please contact me before you bid.
